import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; export const NewsViewPage = () => { return ( <>
News > News Details

Every day throughout the world, someone is looking for an opportunity. Looking for a job is stressful, deeply personal, and complex. With so many options, job seekers need help finding the best opportunities for them. We’re looking for a passionate and self-driven UX Designer who can share our passion for helping people get jobs. We're looking for a passionate and self-driven UX Designer who can share our passion for helping people get jobs. If you excel at product design and usability, have strong customer empathy and can work with a cross functional team to iteratively design simple, inspiring and empowering experiences, then look no further!

You will be part of the International team that focuses on solving problems for job seekers and employers in high priority markets like Japan, Europe, and India. As part of the strategic team in Hyderabad focused on India & emerging markets, you will be addressing challenges unique to these diverse markets while having a lot of fun!

So what would you be doing?

We are constantly experimenting with new product ideas and creating mini-startups within Indeed. Some of these startups succeed and many fail. You will be a core part of the team, bringing ideas to life through product designs and interactions.

While working in a fast-paced, data-driven, and collaborative environment, you will design solutions that solve for specific user needs that lead to improvements in our current product offerings. You then get to apply the learnings to similar markets around the world. If you are passionate about innovation, experimentation, and fast-paced development, all in order to help job seekers worldwide find their dream job, then you will fit right in.

Some of the things that your team will count on you

Identify and transform user needs, insights and functional requirements into simple and inspiring designs.

Lead brainstorming and design sprint sessions in collaboration with the team to generate multiple ideas.

Synthesize inputs from multiple sources into concrete design options and convince the team and stakeholders why we should test them.

Work with researchers, designers and product managers to refine user research plans.

Create quick prototypes to validate new ideas through A/B testing and/or through ad-hoc user feedback sessions with customers and internal users.

Be able to prioritize.

Who You Are

You would fit right in if you have

Experience with mobile-first experiences and design systems, with a demonstrated ability to think through end-to-end solutions with a strong user-centered approach.

3+ years professional experience working in product user experience. Experience in designing for new-to-internet users and/or vernacular users is a big plus!

Language proficiency required in English and Hindi. Additional Indian languages is a plus! Skilled in interaction and visual design and able to autonomously and continually improve the quality of our products.

Degree in Human Computer Interaction, Information Design, Graphic Design, or a related design or behavioral science discipline.

Who we are

We are a fast-moving, data-driven UX team building the most popular job site on the planet. Our teams work in Seattle, San Francisco, Austin, Tokyo, Singapore and Hyderabad, collaborating with Product Managers and Engineering to deliver simple solutions to the real-world problems that job seekers and employers face everyday.

Our Mission

As the world's number 1 job site*, our mission is to help all people get jobs. We strive to cultivate an inclusive and accessible workplace where all people feel comfortable being themselves. We're looking to grow our teams with more people who share our enthusiasm for innovation and creating the best experience for job seekers.

Salary Range Disclaimer

The base salary range represents the low and high end of the Indeed salary range for this position. Actual salaries will vary depending on factors including but not limited to location, experience, and performance. The range listed is just one component of Indeed's total compensation package for employees. Other rewards may include quarterly bonuses, Restricted Stock Units (RSUs), an open Paid Time Off policy, and many region-specific benefits.

Salary Range Transparency
India 2,200,000 - 3,300,000 INR per year
Equal Opportunities and Accommodations Statement

Indeed is deeply committed to creating a workplace and global community where inclusion is not only valued, but prioritized. We’re proud to be an equal opportunity employer, seeking to create a welcoming and diverse environment. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, gender identity or expression, family status, marital status, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, neurodiversity, disability, age, or any other non-merit based or legally protected grounds.

Our Policies and Benefits

View Indeed's Applicant Privacy and Accessibility Policies - https://www.indeed.com/legal/indeed-jobs

Learn about our global employee perks, programs and benefits - https://benefits.indeed.jobs/

Apply Now
) } export default NewsViewPage;
